content:
The zinnia looks pretty cute,
Maybe I could roll it into a ball and throw it...
But didn't Mobai say we shouldn't play with food?
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content: After all, protecting my neighbors' safety is my important mission!
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content: So no more adventuring for you?
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content: "Recent mission"? After that...
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
So, your car was being towed behind the big truck,
just like a lifeboat,
reminds me of a song I used to hum as a kid.
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
I'm from the Driftingale Association, have you heard of us?
We're the Driftingale Association,
Professional! Outgoing! Exploring! Adventuring!
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
So when I saw the zinnia,
I thought I'd found something wild and exciting,
but it turns out you can just... make tea with it?
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Me? Oh, I'm just going to look around some more,
I'm not - being - lazy!
Just giving you some space to grow, mm-hmm.
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
After that? I'll take everyone with me,
traveling from our world bubble to all sorts of amazing places!
That's what Mobai meant by "the new Astralink needs Sani"!
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
If there are a lot of trees around,
blocking your view while picking up items,
you can <color=#38b6c5>move your mouse</color> to get a different angle.
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Hmm, I won't go for now.
Mobai and Glenn said this is an uncharted new Astralink,
and they won't make it without me.
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
I didn't stay for those two,
I stayed for... for...
For you and Frostia!
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Riding waves upon waves we go,
Big ships towing little ones in tow,
Big carts pulling small ones behind,
Sailing through the winds and tides we flow~!
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Chrysanthemum... FLOWER... TORNADO!
Ah nevermind, that'd count as environmental damage,
Mobai would never let me hear the end of it.
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
I heard that after eating certain berries and fungies...
you'll see fish talking to you!
Isn't that super-wild mah!
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Despite what they say,
from what I've seen, Mobai and Glenn
are actually pretty reliable.
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
*ahem* The Camp is almost ready,
Once you've gathered <color=#8AAB4B>5</color> marigolds, you should head back!
Me? I still need to sweep, sweep! Is it clean enough?
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Let me remind you once more,
Yellow, white, and sweetly fragrant little flowers—
Those are zinnias.
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content: However, helping everyone get started with their new Astralink life here is my current mission~!
info: 采集山莓-过程中-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Huh?! W-Wait...
Was all that just reverse psychology to get me to join?!
I bet they wouldn't dare. Yep.

content:
Why do I have to <color=#38b6c5>press F</color> to collect each one individually?
Can't I just summon a tornado—whoosh!
And sweep up all the marigolds at once?
